userStories.title: FDF Question Not Persisting Locally
userStories.description: As a user, I want the Same/Different Elevation dropdown value to persist locally after selection so that when I navigate out and back into a room, my answer is still visible without requiring a sync.
acceptanceCriteria: Same/Different Elevation dropdown value persists locally after selection
Value is still visible when navigating out and back into a room
Value does not require sync to be visible locally

userStories.title: FDF Photo Syncing Failing - entityId.startsWith Error
userStories.description: As a user, I want FDF photos to sync successfully without errors. Currently syncing fails with: TypeError: ue.entityId.startsWith is not a function
acceptanceCriteria: FDF photos sync successfully without errors
Photos are uploaded to Caspio backend correctly
userStories.errorLog: [BackgroundSync] Sync failed: TypeError: ue.entityId.startsWith is not a function at main.6eefdef0138008d6.js:1:2854848
